recommendations: Shashank Singh “Great things never come from comfort zones, Hatsoff to Ms. pankti for the effort she takes while making blogs are commendable. ”

Saunak Mehta “I cannot say enough good things about Pankti! She is a smart, curious and influencer sole. She has a great supporting team and she has a unique set of traits that makes her a great individual to work with. I’ve been working with Pankti for about a year for branding, digital marketing and graphic designing for my real estate company-Ratnam Group, and it has been an outstanding experience. She has all the right resources and her team of experts is doing an excellent job with an extreme level of satisfaction. Pankti is responsive, professional, caring and result-oriented. She breaks all the stereotypes and paves her own path to achieve her goals. She is not only a great businesswoman but also an amazing friend with tremendous integrity and kindness. She has my absolute highest recommendation, and I wish her great success in life and career.”

volunteer_experience.info:
I personally believe that there is joy and happiness in this world only when we give back to society. As a woman, I was always told about the great experience of becoming a mother. As I grew up, I realized that motherhood is a limitless love which can and should be shared with as many kids as possible. It was initially a dream, to share this love with kids who do not know it but as they say, when you wish for something with all your heart, it does come true. Today, I have not 1 but 30 children…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          I personally believe that there is joy and happiness in this world only when we give back to society. As a woman, I was always told about the great experience of becoming a mother. As I grew up, I realized that motherhood is a limitless love which can and should be shared with as many kids as possible. It was initially a dream, to share this love with kids who do not know it but as they say, when you wish for something with all your heart, it does come true. Today, I have not 1 but 30 children from the weaker sections of the society who are my family. I run an NGO called BeCharitable and I volunteer with these kids there who are innocent, talented, smart, and full of love. Be Charitable began with just 12 children and today, with 30 kids, we have a study center set up which is just like a formal study center where these kids are provided education that will one day change and redefine their world. These kids and their future are the responsibility of Be Charitable and in the future, I wish to have resources that allow me to incorporate even more children into the fold of our Be Charitable family so I can give back the love they have filled me with. When education is the first step to a better tomorrow, there are things we can do now to make this world a better place for the people who are suffering. For this reason, I also run a clinic with medical treatment facilities for the poor and the needy since last two years.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

volunteer_experience.title: Founder & Volunteer

publications: [{"title":"Top 100 Solo Travel Blogs, Websites & Influencers in 2020","subtitle":"Feedspot","date":"January 1, 2020"},{"title":"Best Solo Women Travel Blogger","subtitle":"Hello Travel","date":"January 11, 2019"},{"title":"Tripoto Approved Travel Blogger","subtitle":"Tripoto","date":"January 11, 2019"},{"title":"Gujarati Travel Blogger","subtitle":"Crazy Wanderer","date":"January 1, 2019","description":"Over the years, I have worked and written about my experiences in English. However, in recent years, I went back to my roots. I started blogging in Gujarati. Soon enough, my native language started to flow through my pen like a river. Now, I find it therapeutic to write and speak in Gujarati, to express fully what I feel and think and it is a liberty like no other. Taking this new found love one step ahead, I have been blogging, vlogging and creating podcasts in Gujarati and these fill me with immense joy."},{"title":"Travel Blogger","subtitle":"Crazy Wanderer","date":"January 1, 2015","description":"When I am out of the office, I am busy solo traveling. I feel alive when I am in a place I have never been before, I feel a sense of belonging with strangers in towns that are full of cultural experiences, history and heritage, stories that are waiting to be told and that is why I travel. I write a travel blog where I share my experiences, tell the stories I collect from my expeditions and share them with the world. I am a solo traveler and I love to travel with myself, spend time getting to know who I am as a person. I have traveled across India, solo, and have also traveled 9 countries, with a longing to one day travel the entire world. As a solo traveler, my inclination is towards business and luxury travel as I prefer my leisure and comfort when I am on the go. My idea of fun is to have new experiences, try new and good food, experience decent infrastructure and experience temperate climate. I engage with my travel experiences professionally as well by doing blogging campaigns, Business and Luxury Travel - Collaboration and Consulting, I am a travel Instagrammer, as well as a freelance travel writer and social media strategist. It is a blessing to have my passion as my work so for me, it feels like the best of both worlds has come together."}]

organizations.title: Be Charitable
organizations.description: I personally believe that there is joy and happiness in this world only when we give back to society. As a woman, I was always told about the great experience of becoming a mother. As I grew up, I realized that motherhood is a limitless love which can and should be shared with as many kids as possible. It was initially a dream, to share this love with kids who do not know it but as they say, when you wish for something with all your heart, it does come true. Today, I have not 1 but 30 children from the weaker sections of the society who are my family. I run an NGO called BeCharitable and I volunteer with these kids there who are innocent, talented, smart, and full of love. Be Charitable began with just 12 children and today, with 30 kids, we have a study center set up which is just like a formal study center where these kids are provided education that will one day change and redefine their world. These kids and their future are the responsibility of Be Charitable and in the future, I wish to have resources that allow me to incorporate even more children into the fold of our Be Charitable family so I can give back the love they have filled me with. When education is the first step to a better tomorrow, there are things we can do now to make this world a better place for the people who are suffering. For this reason, I also run a clinic with medical treatment facilities for the poor and the needy for the last two years.
